name: N.Y.C. Drift
description:
Drift around a real map of NYC!

This game was created for the GeoPipe New York City Jam using GeoPipe's real-world model of NYC.

Race!

Try and navigate through the twisting streets as fast as possible! A slippery car is perfect for the right angles and getting around landmarks like Columbus Circle.

Compete!

A stopwatch allows you to fine-tune your skills to compare against other players.

Hope you enjoy! I made this in hopes of winning the jam to fund my next game :)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**IMPORTANT NOTES**
  • Part of the jam requirements were that I use GeoPipe's real world map. Unfortunately, there are some weird road issues that sometimes cause your car to get stuck! To fix this I added an 'unstuck' button that will pop you up and out of most sinkholes. The button is the spacebar.
  • Controls are just WASD along with the spacebar for unstuck and tab for quick restart
  • No idea why the main menu is off, this is my first time using HTML builds 😅

Post a screenshot of your best time in the comments and I’ll keep a scoreboard :D
